openstack_db_instance_v1.description: Manages a V1 DB instance resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to create the db instance. Changing this

name.description: Database to be created on new instance. Changing this creates a

flavor_id.description: The flavor ID of the desired flavor for the instance.

configuration_id.description: Configuration ID to be attached to the instance. Database instance

size.description: Specifies the volume size in GB. Changing this creates new instance.

datastore.description: An array of database engine type and version. The datastore

network.description: An array of one or more networks to attach to the

user.description: An array of username, password, host and databases. The user

database.description: An array of database name, charset and collate. The database

type.description: Database engine type to be used in new instance. Changing this

version.description: Version of database engine type to be used in new instance.

fixed_ip_v4.description: Specifies a fixed IPv4 address to be used on this

fixed_ip_v6.description: Specifies a fixed IPv6 address to be used on this

password.description: User's password. Changing this creates a

host.description: An ip address or % sign indicating what ip addresses can connect with

databases.description: A list of databases that user will have access to. If not specified,

collate.description: Database collation. Changing this creates a new instance.

charset.description: Database character set. Changing this creates a
